photos.title: Your photos
photos.delete_confirm_description: Are you sure you want to delete this photo? This action cannot be undone.
photos.max_reached: You have uploaded the maximum number of photos

photos.min_one_required: You must have at least one photo

photos.invalid_format: Invalid format. Only JPG, PNG and WebP allowed.

settings.title: Settings
settings.delete_account_description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All your data will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.
settings.notifications_description: Control push notifications and email here. More options coming soon.
settings.privacy_description: Control who can see your profile, photos and activity. More options coming soon.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.empty: No achievements yet. Complete actions in the app to unlock them!

report.title: Report
report.intro: Describe what happened. Your report will be reviewed within 24 hours according to our reporting policy.
report.context_placeholder: Describe what happened, when and where. You can attach screenshots or messages below.
report.evidence_hint: Screenshots, messages or other files (max 5, JPG/PNG/WebP/PDF).
report.witness_placeholder: If someone else saw or knows something, describe it here.
report.fill_required: Please fill in violation type and context.
report.upload_error: Could not upload file. Try again.
report.submit_error: Could not submit report. Try again.
report.received_message: We have received your report and will review it within 24 hours. You will get feedback within 48 hours.
report.history_intro: See status of your submitted reports. You will get feedback within 48 hours.

admin.access_denied: You do not have permission to view this page.

appeal.title: Appeal sanction
appeal.intro: Have you received a sanction you want to appeal? Describe your case. We review appeals within 72 hours.
appeal.reason_placeholder: Describe why you are appealing and which sanction it concerns.
appeal.submit_error: Could not submit appeal. Try again.
appeal.received_message: We have received your appeal and will review it within 72 hours. You will get feedback in the app.
